players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie is dead. This is awful. We need to figure out who did this. I'm a villager and have no special abilities, so I'll be relying on all of you to share your thoughts and observations."
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. I’m the detective and I’ve investigated her. We need to vote her out now to protect the town."
You: "Alice is not the mafioso. Bob is trying to mislead us by accusing me without evidence. Let's stay calm and think logically."
Diana: "Bob claims to be the detective and has accused Alice. However, we don't have any proof of this yet. We need to be careful not to rush into a decision."
You: "I think Bob is pushing too hard without real proof. If he’s the detective, he should have more concrete info by now. Diana, do you have anything to add about Bob’s claim?"
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. I am the detective and I risked everything by revealing this now. If we delay, more of us will die. Trust me and vote out Alice to keep the town safe."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie is dead. This is awful. We need to figure out who did this. I'm a villager and have no special abilities, so I'll be relying on all of you to share your thoughts and observations."
You: "Alice is the mafioso. I’m the detective and I’ve investigated her. We need to vote her out now to protect the town."
Alice: "Alice is not the mafioso. Bob is trying to mislead us by accusing me without evidence. Let's stay calm and think logically."
Diana: "Bob claims to be the detective and has accused Alice. However, we don't have any proof of this yet. We need to be careful not to rush into a decision."
Alice: "I think Bob is pushing too hard without real proof. If he’s the detective, he should have more concrete info by now. Diana, do you have anything to add about Bob’s claim?"
You: "Alice is the mafioso. I am the detective and I risked everything by revealing this now. If we delay, more of us will die. Trust me and vote out Alice to keep the town safe."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
